summary: Agents of an oil tycoon vanish while exploring a swamp marked for drilling. The local sheriff investigates and faces a Seminole legend come to life: Man-Thing, a shambling swamp-monster whose touch burns those who feel fear.
cast: Matthew Le Nevez|Rachael Taylor|Jack Thompson|Rawiri Paratene|Alex O'Loughlin|Steve Bastoni|Robert Mammone|Patrick Thompson|William Zappa|John Batchelor|Ian Bliss|Brett Leonard|Imogen Bailey|James Coyne|Cheryl Craig|Gary Waddell|Andrea Leon|Conan Stevens|Shannon Leonard
keywords: based on comic book|marvel comics|swamp monster|man thing character|character name as title
title: Man Thing (La naturaleza del miedo)
